overview: The film intertwines two parallel realities. The first one is the rehearsal of the play “The Little Prince”, which is conducted by the actor Alexander Zhdanovich with actors - children from a psycho-neurological boarding school. The second is the different spheres of life in which heroes appear, revealing their inner world, their state of mind in the present moment. Loneliness, love, impossibility to love, a feeling of confusion, mercy, joy of children from the orphanage ...

production_companies.name: Studio in the name of St. John Warrior

title: Long Live The Little Prince
